document_data.name: Penguin
document_data.mainbody: '''Penguins''' were aquatic flightless birds. They lived on the floes of the [[Sea of Moving Ice]] and in [[Alpuk]].
document_data.Abilities: An average penguin could hold its breath for about 6 minutes.
document_data.Ecology: The penguins of the Sea of Moving Ice were preyed upon by [[polar bear]]s and [[walrus]]es. Those in [[Alpuk]] were hunted by [[Iulutiun]]s, who ate them raw and considered them among their favorite birds as food.{{Cite dragon/116/By Tooth and Claw|64}}
document_data.Trivia:
* ''[[Rod of wonder|Rods of wonder]]'' had a small chance of turning their users into penguins.
* Countess [[Zaranda Star]]'s bedspread in [[Morninggold Keep]] was embroidered with [[elk]]s and penguins.
